title: Privacy Policy
description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

sections.content: This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how Pathon (also referred to as "we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, discloses, and protects your personal data when you access or use our platform, including the website, mobile applications, and any associated services ("Services"). By using the Services, you consent to the practices described in this Policy.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.description: Types of data collected by Pathon
sections.content: We collect two types of data: personal information (such as name or contact details) and usage information (such as device details or browsing behavior).

subsections.title: 1.1 Information You Provide
items: Account Data: Mobile number and email for OTP-based login.
Profile Data: Name, photo, date of birth, address, education, profession.
Content Data: Course titles, descriptions, YouTube links, uploaded files, and tags.
Financial Data: Payment IDs or mobile wallet numbers (but not sensitive info like balance or PIN).
Feedback: Course reviews, ratings, and complaint submissions.

subsections.title: 1.2 Information Collected Automatically
items: System Data: Device type, OS, IP address, browser, and technical diagnostics.
Usage Data: Interactions like course views, search queries, page clicks, and time spent.
Geographic Data: Approximate city and country based on IP address.

subsections.title: 1.3 Cookies and Tracking
subsections.content: We use cookies and related technologies to personalize your experience, monitor performance, and analyze usage patterns.

sections.title: How We Use Your Data
sections.description: Purposes for which data is used
sections.content: We use your data to operate and improve our Services, including:
sections.additionalContent:
‚úìCreating and managing accounts
‚úìCustomizing content and recommendations
‚úìAuthenticating logins via OTP
‚úìProcessing payments and instructor payouts
‚úìInvestigating fraud or misconduct
‚úìDelivering notifications, reminders, and announcements
‚úìConducting analytics to improve features and usability

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We use encryption, access controls, and secure storage practices to protect your information. However, no digital platform can guarantee 100% security.

sections.title: Third-Party Services
sections.description: External services used by the platform
sections.content: Some platform features (e.g., live video, YouTube embedding, payment gateways) are powered by third parties. We do not control how they handle your data, so we recommend reviewing their privacy policies separately.

sections.title: Children's Data
sections.content: Pathon is open to all ages. While age-based content filters are under development, parents and guardians are encouraged to supervise minors' usage.

sections.title: User Conduct and Content
sections.content: Users are solely responsible for the content they create or upload. Pathon reserves the right to remove content that violates laws, community guidelines, or ethical standards. Complaints can be filed within a limited time after course enrollment.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
sections.description: How and when the policy may be updated
sections.content: We may update this Policy periodically. Significant changes will be notified via platform banners or email. Continued use indicates agreement to the updated Policy.
